ComicInfo.Title: Leatherhead Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Leatherhead” Part 2! Mysterious intruders bring death and destruction to the new inhabitants of the Technodrome! Does Leatherhead know more than he’s letting on? Who can the Turtles trust?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Mateus Santolouco | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 2 | Sub | Art Appreciation Month Subscription Cover | Cory Smith | 3 | RE | Ottawa Comicon Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 4 | RE | Eastman Fan Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 5 | *Notes:* The Art Appreciation Month Subscription Cover is a homage and a parody of Leonardo DaVinci's Mona Lisa.The Ottawa Comiccon Exclusive Variant Cover is a homage of the poster for Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:41:00. [CVDB527031]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman, Bobby Curnow, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Cory Smith, Kevin Eastman, Mateus Santolouco, Ronda Pattison
ComicInfo.Characters: Ch'rell, Donatello, Fugitoid, Leatherhead, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Mouser, Raphael, Sergeant Granitor, Traag
ComicInfo.Teams: Rock Soldiers, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Utroms
